edu.ccsu.interfaces

Interface ScreenEnabledDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Device, LightEnabledDevice
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LcdScreen

    public interface ScreenEnabledDevice
extends LightEnabledDevice
    Screen enabled device that provides functionality to print Messages and change the sceen color
    Author:
    Adrian
